name: Macaroni Masterpiece Maker
description:
Confession:
I've never made art using pasta in real life. This project was made in 48 hours for the 2021 GMTK Game Jam!

Do you hate making a mess with glue but love getting your grubby little hands on a tub of dried pasta and just making a masterpiece?

If your answer is no, then you're wrong, and your answer should be yes.

Click and drag the pasta pieces over the glue before placing it on the page. You're only allowed one piece of unglued pasta at once. Use the mouse scroll to turn the pasta!

This little simulator game lets you make digital pasta art. This program includes some basic pastas and glues for you to play with, all digitally drawn (by yours truly).  The game also has a handy screenshot button, with all images going into the "Images" folder. Part of why there isn't more to the program is because I drew all the assets myself, but it's also because this is my first game jam I've completed.

I hope everyone enjoys this "game"!
